logout.question: Are you sure you want to logout?

reset_password.title: Reset Password
reset_password.description: If you have forgotten your password, please use the phone number associated with your registered account and we will send you a new password via SMS. If necessary, you can change it in your personal area.
reset_password.success: A new password has been sent to the specified number

change_password.title: Change password
change_password.description: The new password must contain uppercase and lowercase Latin letters, as well as at least one number
